description: Updates the existing signaling channel. This is an asynchronous operation and takes time to complete. If the MessageTtlSeconds value is updated (either increased or reduced), it only applies to new messages sent via this channel after it's been updated. Existing messages are still expired as per the previous MessageTtlSeconds value.

parameters.name: ChannelARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the signaling channel that you want to update.

parameters.name: CurrentVersion
parameters.description: The current version of the signaling channel that you want to update.

parameters.name: SingleMasterConfiguration
parameters.description: The structure containing the configuration for the SINGLE_MASTER type of the signaling channel that you want to update. MessageTtlSeconds (integer) --- The period of time a signaling channel retains undelivered messages before they are discarded.

nested_params.name: MessageTtlSeconds
nested_params.description: The period of time a signaling channel retains undelivered messages before they are discarded.
